title._content: Inside Of The Piche & Miron Meat Market

description._content: 1908 Copy 1 40.4 cm x 27.3 cm. Oversize Black and white photograph Copy 2 35.3 cm x 25.8 cm Black and white photograph. Photograph showing the inside of the Piche & Miron Meat Market. Eggs, sausages, and weigh scales on counter. Nine men and a boy are in the store. A dog is sitting on the weigh scale. Meat on hooks behind the counter and on right wall. Deer horns a moose head mounted on walls. Re information written on back: Left to right back of counter – Joe Miron, W. Warren, Ross Marselis, Mandus Rosine. Front: J. Rose, Earl Humprey (boy), R. Coultry. To side of dog - Chris Jensen and Frank Coultry. Albertan - local. Reproductions: 35 mm Negative available. To obtain high quality and larger reproductions of this image please visit the Galt Museum & Archives website: www.galtmuseum.com/archives.htm and include thIs number in your request: P19754374004
